title: Crime Alert 07.18.19
itunes:title: Crime Alert 07.18.19
description:
Portland police call for anti-mask laws to fight public violence. Woman arrested after splashing hot coffee on fast food employee. Man arrested for keeping meth addicted squirrel.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
